comment.author: 12399948@N00
comment._content: Its called Walcheren, not Walcheran. impressive picture

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: Thanks for the comment!  It's always tricky with archival photos because the person who took the photo often writes inaccurate information on the photograph.  To maintain the authenticity of the record, we preserve that inaccurate information with a correction note but I will change the Flickr titles to reflect the correct name.  Thanks again!
